about_the_game:
Play as Garou, the Human Monster and self-proclaimed Hero Hunter, in ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS.
This pack also includes an original story for Garou.

Contents:
- Additional playable character: Garou
- Original Garou story
- Avatar Parts
- A Killer Move for your avatar
detailed_description:
Play as Garou, the Human Monster and self-proclaimed Hero Hunter, in ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS.

name: ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS DLC Pack 4: Garou

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 680
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Play as Garou, the Human Monster and self-proclaimed Hero Hunter, in ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS. This pack also includes an original story for Garou.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
